Articles.Content: I feel like I'm not the only one with a LOT of saved ships in my 'load' list. I think it would be helpful to be able to create files to put related craft into to make searching easier. Would be especially useful for multiple iterations of the same ship (Mk I, Mk II, etc.).
I Agree, I have far too many crafts in my VAB folder, and often pick the wrong one when launching.

There are enough threads for this already. Please use some sort of search before posting a suggestion.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58442-Saved-Rockets-%28maybe-sub-assemblies-too%29-allow-for-folders-of-designs?highlight=folders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49375-Nameable-Folders-for-Loading-Menu-of-Spacecraft?highlight=folders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49465-Folders-for-sub-assemblies?highlight=folders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45895-Folders?highlight=folders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63528-Folder-structures-and-note-read-outs?highlight=folders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44404-Folder-System-for-Spaceplanes-Spacecraft?highlight=folders

They're not really that old, either, so if you've something to add to those threads, please do so. But I don't think we need yet another thread for this, so please take it to one of the others.
